message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! It's a unique item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $160, can we meet in the middle at $165?

Thanks for the offer, Bob! I understand that $180 is a bit high for you. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I get a good price for the product. I can do $170, which is a bit closer to your offer. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant at $170. I'm willing to pay $165, which is the same price I offered earlier. Can we meet at this price?

I understand that you're sticking to your original offer, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I get a good deal. I can do $167, which is a bit higher than your offer but still a compromise. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant at $167. I'm willing to pay $162, which is a bit lower than your latest offer. Can we meet at this price?

I understand that you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I get a good price for the product. I can do $165, which is a bit higher than your latest offer but still a compromise. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not convinced that $165 is the best price. I'm willing to pay $159, which is a bit lower than your latest offer. Can we meet at this price?
